about_the_game:
Disaster Blaster is a roguelite card game where you're a mad scientist building the ultimate doomsday weapon! Design your blaster by choosing which cards to sequence, step by step, based on their effects, multiplying bullets, adding explosive or electrifying effects, while testing it in simulated attacks. No shooting or dodging required, just evolve your weapon and try to destroy the entire planet!

This game is currently in development. All visual materials presented on this page are temporary and will be expanded as development progresses.

Build your blaster...

Add and swap cards in your weapon as their effects are applied in sequence to the next shot. Boost the damage, increase shooting speed, turn bullets into incendiary and bouncing projectiles! Make incredible combos and watch your creation evolve and transform into an indomitable force!

...Destroy everything else

Test your weapon in a virtual conquest mission led by an alien who will face endless waves of enemies until the entire planet is destroyed.

Discover new planets and alien species

Discover new planets and face native alien species, each with unique abilities. Unlock them as aliens you can use to test your weapons in future runs, harnessing their powers for even more dynamic gameplay.

Unlock new upgrades

Unlock dozens of different cards for your weapon and combine them with alien abilities to maximize your offensive potential.

Fast-paced and varied

Enjoy intense 15-minute matches with endless customization possibilities. Each game is a different experience!
